00050 using namespace Hypertable;

00052 using namespace std;

00054 namespace {
00055 
00056   struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00057     static void init_options() {
00058       cmdline_desc("Usage: %s [options] <filename>\n\n"
00059         "Dumps the contents of the CellStore contained in the DFS <filename>."
00060         "\n\nOptions").add_options()
00061         ("all,a", "Dump everything, including key/value pairs")
00062         ("count,c", "Count the number of key/value pairs")
00063         ("end-key", str(), "Ignore keys that are greater than <arg>")
00064         ("start-key", str(), "Ignore keys that are less than or equal to <arg>")
00065         ;
00066       cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("filename", str(), "");
00067       cmdline_positional_desc().add("filename", -1);
00068     }
00069     static void init() {
00070       if (!has("filename")) {
00071         HT_ERROR_OUT <<"filename required" << HT_END;
00072         cout << cmdline_desc() << endl;
00073         exit(1);
00074       }
00075     }
00076   };
00077 
00078   typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00079 
00080 } // local namespace
00081 
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00084   try {
00085     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00086 
00087     bool dump_all = has("all");
00088     bool count_keys = has("count");
00089     String start_key = get("start-key", String());
00090     String end_key = get("end-key", String());
00091     bool got_end_key = has("end-key");
00092     bool hit_start = start_key.empty();
00093     int timeout = get_i32("timeout");
00094     String fname = get_str("filename");
00095 
00096     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00097 
00098     DfsBroker::Client *dfs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, properties);
00099 
00100     if (!dfs->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00101       cerr << "error: timed out waiting for DFS broker" << endl;
00102       exit(1);
00103     }
00104 
00105     Global::dfs = dfs;
00106 
00107     Global::block_cache = new FileBlockCache(200000000LL);
00108 
00112     CellStorePtr cellstore = CellStoreFactory::open(fname, 0, 0);
00113     CellListScanner *scanner = 0;
00114 
00118     uint64_t key_count = 0;
00119     ByteString key, value;
00120     Key key_comps;
00121 
00125     if (dump_all || count_keys) {
00126       ScanContextPtr scan_ctx(new ScanContext());
00127 
00128       scanner = cellstore->create_scanner(scan_ctx);
00129       while (scanner->get(key_comps, value)) {
00130 
00131         if (!hit_start) {
00132           if (strcmp(key_comps.row, start_key.c_str()) <= 0) {
00133             scanner->forward();
00134             continue;
00135           }
00136           hit_start = true;
00137         }
00138         if (got_end_key && strcmp(key_comps.row, end_key.c_str()) > 0)
00139           break;
00140         if (count_keys)
00141           key_count++;
00142         else
00143           cout << key_comps << endl;
00144         scanner->forward();
00145       }
00146       delete scanner;
00147     }
00148 
00149     if (count_keys) {
00150       cout << key_count << endl;
00151       return 0;
00152     }
00153 
00157     cout << endl;
00158     cout << "BLOCK INDEX:" << endl;
00159     cellstore->display_block_info();
00160 
00164     cout << endl;
00165     if (cellstore->get_bloom_filter() != 0) {
00166       cout << "BLOOM FILTER SIZE: "
00167            << cellstore->get_bloom_filter()->size() << endl;
00168     }
00169     else {
00170       cout << "BLOOM FILTER SIZE: 0" << endl;
00171     }
00172 
00176     CellStoreTrailer *trailer = cellstore->get_trailer();
00177 
00178     cout << endl;
00179     cout << "TRAILER:" << endl;
00180     trailer->display_multiline(cout);
00181 
00182     cout << endl;
00183     cout << "OTHER:" << endl;
00184     cout << "split row '" << cellstore->get_split_row() << "'" << endl;
00185   }
00186   catch (Exception &e) {
00187     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00188     return 1;
00189   }
00190 
00191   return 0;
00192 }
